page.title: 10HOUSING
page.content: Leyland has various types of housing. The houses in the centre of Leyland are mainly turn_of_the_century terraced.Moss Side is part of{Central {Lancashire Development}and the housing is both council and privately owned. Worden Park estate is a new estate of private property.The houses are detatched and semi_detatched and vary in price.It is a nice quiet area with health club,schools and Runshaw College.However there is little entertainment and quite a distance from buses,telephone boxes and a post box. Wade Hall and Broadfield are both large council estates built soon after the war.My house is on Kingsway,Wade Hall and has 3 bedrooms,a sitting room,a kitchen,a washroom and a small garden.A few houses have been bought from the council.
